TopicTitle: Looking to start a youtube channel, any ideas?

Articles.Content: Well, what should I do? Play KSP? Play Tf2? HL2? Or just random games with a few series? I'm looking at a Gaming channel, I'll probably start with some Warcraft III or KSP, I need Username Suggestions.

When you have no idea, please don't do it.

Don't create a youtube channel "just because", create one because you have something interesting to show or tell. Preferably something which isn't the same thousands of other people are doing.

Edited July 30, 2013 by Crush

Let me redo this, I've wanted to create a youtube channel, but I'm stuck on what to actually show, As the person above has said, ''Preferably something which isn't the same thousands of other people are doing'' Which is probably games, which now that I think, I should play without recording, at least till I get RSI and Commentary Let's plays can take my mind of RSI.
